p: A total of 823 out of the 4,056 images used in this study were manually selected according to the following characteristics: the image should show the entire insect body (to visualize all relevant morphological features) and should have been taken with a mobile phone. Fig 2 shows some captured images of male and female Ae. aegypti photographed using a digital camera ( Fig 2A, 2B, 2C and 2D) and mobile phone ( Fig 2E and 2F).
